Strings.Text: The door is tightly\nlocked.{clear 0}There's a plate on right\nhand side.
\nIt's locked.{clear 0}Use the lockpick to open\nthe door.
There is no time to check\nit.
{scroll 2}They have escaped\ninto the mansion{clear 48}where they thought\nit was safe.{clear 48}Yet···{timed 48}
{scroll 2}You have once\n{scroll 2}again entered{clear 48}{scroll 2}the world of\n{scroll 2}survival horror.{clear 48}{scroll 2}Good luck!{timed 48}
{scroll 2}Be smart!\n{scroll 2}Fighting foes{clear 48}{scroll 2}isn't the only\n{scroll 2}way to survive{clear 48}{scroll 2}this horror.{timed 64}
\nIt's an old typewriter.{clear 0}If I had an {color 1}INK RIBBON{color 0}, I\ncould save my progress...

You can save your progress
with this.{clear 0}Will you use
the {color 1}INK RIBBON{color 0}?{branch 0 1 0}You can save your progress
with this.{clear 0}Will you save your progress?{branch 0 1 0}The number 002 is engraved.
You can save your progress\nwith this.{clear 0}Will you save your progress?{branch 0 1 0}The number 002 is engraved.
All pages are blank.\nWhat's it for...?
There was a medal in the\nbook.
The mixing seems to have\nfailed. It disappeared.
Will you mix the herbs?{branch 0 1 0}Mixing these does not seem\nto work.
Mixing these does not seem\nto work.
This chemical can be mixed\nwith other chemicals.
You don't need to use this\nitem at the moment.
